title: Ravaged Rose
description: Matty MontclairQuarterback of the football team.We were friends until he abandoned me.He left my heart ravaged once.And I think he might do it again.Ryleigh KendrickUber-nerdy artsy girl next door.We used to be friends, but I moved on.Now she’s seen things she shouldn’t have.And it’s up to me to ensure her silence.Ravaged Rose is a prequel to the Rosehaven Academy series. A few characters from the series make cameo appearances, however this book is simply a standalone in the Rosehaven world meant to introduce my readers to my writing style. It's also available as an exclusive download for my newsletter subscribers.
author: Leila James
